Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the great Ituk Glacier, which can be seen if you look north.
Room.LongDescription: Mount Tasletek is slightly northwest of you, and directly north, far in the distance you can see Plasnelt Mountain and the Plasnelt Range. Mount Caledonia is that peak just to the east of the Plasnelt Mountain, and the closest peak to the east is Hafnia Mountain.
